alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:55AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A LINE OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN CARLTON AND CENTRAL DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 855 AM CDT, a line of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Hawthorne, to near Foxboro, to 6 miles northwest of Holyoke, and moving east at 35 mph. Visibilities of 1/4 mile or less, wind gusts up to 30 mph, and rapid snow accumulation on roads are expected with this line of heavy snow showers. This line of heavy snow showers will be near... Lake Nebagamon around 910 AM CDT. Hawthorne around 920 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this line of heavy snow showers include Bennett, Pattison State Park, Pleasant Valley, Scotts Corner, Patzau, Amnicon Lake, Lyman Lake and Jay Cooke State Park. Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in this line of heavy snow showers. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.
